title: net/http: TestZeroLengthPostAndResponse flake
body:
Saw http://build.golang.org/log/135843e1ffbbfeeeab66a2cd93e8915412ba7ea7 :

```
ok  	mime/multipart	0.645s
ok  	mime/quotedprintable	1.817s
ok  	net	3.008s
--- FAIL: TestZeroLengthPostAndResponse (0.01s)
	serve_test.go:1362: client post #3: Post http://127.0.0.1:47752: net/http: request canceled
FAIL
FAIL	net/http	11.435s
ok  	net/http/cgi	1.570s
ok  	net/http/cookiejar	0.040s
```
